meanings.definition: One who takes part in something.
meanings.sent1: The partakers of the school play were excited to perform on stage.
meanings.sent2: The partakers of the picnic enjoyed the delicious food and games.
meanings.sent3: The partakers of the baking contest were determined to win with their best recipes.
meanings.sent4: The partakers of the treasure hunt searched eagerly for the hidden clues.
meanings.sent5: The partakers of the charity event generously donated their time and resources.

meanings.sent1: We all partakers in the fun activities during the holiday party.
meanings.sent2: She partakers in the community clean-up event every month.
meanings.sent3: The team partakers in the exciting challenge with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: He partakers in the dance competition with skill and grace.
meanings.sent5: They partakers in the marathon to support a good cause.
